Package org.mokai

Mokai API and SPI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Acceptor Acceptors are used inside ConnectorServices to match messages that are going to be processed.
Action Performs an operation with a message (validation, transformation, etc.).
Configurable Implemented by extensions (receivers, processors, acceptors and actions) that need to be configured when added to the routing engine and destroyed when removed.
Connector Marker interface implemented by connectors.
ConnectorContext Holds external information about the Connector implementation.
ConnectorService A wrapper of a Connector that holds a collection of acceptors, pre-processing actions, post-processing actions and post-receiving actions.
Execution Used by Action implementations to control the execution of the message (eg.
ExposableConfiguration<T> Implemented by extensions (receivers, processors, acceptors and actions) that expose a configuration object.
MessageProducer Used by Connectors to inject messages into the gateway.
Monitorable Implemented by extensions that can be monitored for broken links.
Processor This interface is implemented by the connectors that want to process messages.
RoutingEngine Controls the message flow inside the gateway between applications and connections, which are represented by a ConnectorService.
Service Implemented by classes that can be started, stopped and return state.
Serviceable Implemented by receivers and processors that can be started and stopped.
 

Class Summary
Message Represents a message that is being routing through the gateway.
MonitorStatusBuilder Utility class to help create the Monitorable.Status objects.
 

Enum Summary
Message.Direction Tells whether the message is outbound (from applications to connections) or inbound (from connections to applications)
Monitorable.Status Possible values of the status of an extension.
Service.State Possible states of a Service.
 

Exception Summary
ExecutionException Unchecked exception thrown when there is a problem in the framework execution.
ObjectAlreadyExistsException Thrown when the object that is being created already exists.
ObjectNotFoundException Thrown when a searched object is not found.
 

Package org.mokai Description

Mokai API and SPI.
